bridgeif_fdb.c File Reference

Overview

lwIP netif implementing an FDB for IEEE 802.1D MAC Bridge

Functions

void bridgeif_fdb_update_src (void *fdb_ptr, struct eth_addr *src_addr, u8_t port_idx)
 A real simple and slow implementation of an auto-learning forwarding database that remembers known src mac addresses to know which port to send frames destined for that mac address. More...

 Walk our list of auto-learnt fdb entries and return a port to forward or BR_FLOOD if unknown. More...
